author: peter_firmstone
msg: New signatures containing MarshalledInstance were too similar to those containing MarshalledObject, such that when a null parameter was given by client code, the correct method signature to select was ambiguous and caused a compile time error.
New signatures changed slightly to avoid ambiguous matches.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Copy trunk into gcc-4.4 branch before porting to gcc-4.5.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Change build scripts to make them work with GCC 4.5. Add a script to help install GCC 4.5 on Ubuntu.
